Properties

HandledTypes

The hit target types this processor handles (bitmask). Use bitwise OR to handle multiple types: HitTargetType.Node | HitTargetType.Group

public abstract HitTargetType HandledTypes { get; }

Property Value

HitTargetType

Name

Display name for debugging.

public abstract string Name { get; }

Property Value

string

Priority

Priority for checking this processor. Higher = checked first.

public abstract int Priority { get; }

Property Value

int

Checks if this processor handles the given target type (O(1) bitmask check).

HandlePointerMoved(InputStateContext, GraphHitTestResult, PointerEventArgs)

Handles pointer moved. Called during idle state for hover effects.

HandlePointerPressed(InputStateContext, GraphHitTestResult, PointerPressedEventArgs)

Handles pointer pressed on an element this processor is responsible for.

public virtual InputProcessorResult HandlePointerPressed(InputStateContext context, GraphHitTestResult hit, PointerPressedEventArgs e)

Parameters

context InputStateContext

The input state context.

hit GraphHitTestResult

The hit test result (guaranteed to be a type from HandledTypes).

e PointerPressedEventArgs

The Avalonia pointer event.

Returns

InputProcessorResult

Result indicating whether handled and any state transition.
